• LLM – Large Language Model: A type of AI trained on massive text datasets.

• NLP – Natural Language Processing: The ability of AI to understand and process human language.

• Prompt Engineering – The process of crafting input to get better AI responses.

• Neural Network – A system modeled after the human brain to recognize patterns.

• Machine Learning – A branch of AI focused on systems that learn from data.
